benchmark_details.name: X-LeBench: A Benchmark for Extremely Long Egocentric Video Understanding
benchmark_details.overview: X-LeBench is a versatile benchmark dataset specifically designed for evaluating tasks on extremely long egocentric video recordings, including a life-logging simulation pipeline that produces realistic daily plans aligned with real-world video data.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating the understanding of extremely long egocentric videos.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Some contextual inconsistencies exist within the dataset.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the accuracy of task-specific outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in video understanding tasks.
